    fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.env  

    • Uses of ConverterBuilder in fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.env

      Classes in fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.env that implement ConverterBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ConverterBuilderDelegate<P>
      Implementation that just delegates all operations to another builder.
      class  SimpleConverterBuilder<P>
      A ConverterBuilder that builds the converter: If a custom converter is defined, use it If no custom converter, use DefaultConverter If DefaultConverter or custom converter that also implements ConverterRegistry, register all previously registered SupportingConverters
